english.segment1: At daybreak I wait for You. Crush softly, come. With the brilliance and weight of Jupiter. You weaken me as with wounds
english.segment2: It's always enough. To sound the deeps Numinous. By falling under. It's always enough. To run Your way Numinous. And I will follow
english.segment3: At sundown I wait for You. Speak softly, come. Dying now with the way. That Your voice and music. Are the same to me
english.segment4: It's always enough. To sound the deeps Numinous. By falling under. It's always enough. To run Your way Numinous. And I will follow
english.segment5: One day's enough. To know all fullness. I'll run Your way. You will enlarge my heart. Though You slay me. I will hope in You through all. Forgive the best of what we do and are. Just God, forgive
english.segment6: It's always enough. To sound the deeps Numinous. By falling under. It's always enough. To run Your way Numinous. And I will follow.
